text: Eggolsheim is a municipality in the district of Forchheim in Bavaria in Germany. == Subdivisions == Eggolsheim has twelve other villages within its municipal area: * Bammersdorf * Drosendorf * Drügendorf * Eggolsheim * Götzendorf * Jägersburg * Kauernhofen * Neuses an der Regnitz * Rettern * Schirnaidel * Tiefenstürmig * Unterstürmig * Weigelshofen ==References== Category:Forchheim (district)
title: Eggolsheim
